txt.en: 'Pigs may look like filthy animals, but they're really very clean...when they want to be....'
'There's nothing wrong with being a pig farmer. You don't see people looking down their noses at pipe-weed farmers!'
'You might not think it to look at them, but pigs are very noble creatures.'
'I'm thinking about heading to The Golden Perch for a bit of beer and sausage.'
